scripts.compile-es5: npm run tsc && ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs lib-es5/whenable.js --compress --mangle --source-map content='lib-es5/whenable.js.map' -o lib-es5/whenable.min.js
scripts.compile-es6: npm run tsc -- --module es6 --outDir lib-es6 && ./node_modules/uglify-es/bin/uglifyjs lib-es6/whenable.js --compress --mangle --source-map content='lib-es6/whenable.js.map' -o lib-es6/whenable.min.js
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run compile-es5 && npm run compile-es6
